pr_title: Add snapshot dependencies layer in explode mode for standard jar.

timeline.bodyText:
I think it's okay to embed the predicate. And I think the name 'isSnapshot' is fine in this local scope.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                          .filter(isNotSnapshotDependency)
          
          
            
                          .filter(isSnapshot.negate())
